revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2640U |revision=C4 |fcc_date=12/24/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=DareGlobal |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=KA2DSL-2640U |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63281 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9725G6JB-25 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4313 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui=FC:75:16 |default_ch= }} Additional models include.. *DSL-2640U *DSL-2730U *DSL-2730B *DSL-2640B
The FCC EUT's photos are not particularly good - the SoC (which would seem to be a BCM63281) is covered w/ a heatsink and the resolution is low. A MAC label w/ a 1C:BD:B9 ('''D-Link International''') OUI is affixed to the board, but it is not known if it is used.
A FC:75:16 ('''D-Link International''') OUI may also be used by this device
